name: IMF 2
description:
Are you bored of the current version of IMF?

Would you sacrifice your personal privacy for marginally more content?

Do you love corporate greed?

Regardless of how you answered the previous questions, IMF 2 is for you!

Featuring:

  • Competitive battle pass
  • Daily challenges
  • Thrilling open world gameplay
  • Login incentives
  • Only windows support
    • Maybe an android port if you buy enough skins
  • Loot boxes
  • Dedicated servers
  • Mandatory internet connectivity
  • Premium content
    • Skins
    • Cards
    • Card Packs
    • Upgrades
    • Aimbot
  • Analytics
  • Trackers

As part of the release of IMF 2, IMF 1 and its servers will be PERMANENTLY removed from the internet, and you will be SUED for playing it.

Note: Progressing past the tutorial will require a $20/month online membership

Terms and conditions apply
